rooms.detail: Looking around, you notice a strange marking on one of the trees. It appears to be an arrow pointing north.
rooms.name: Forest Clearing
rooms.description: You find yourself in a quiet forest clearing. Tall trees surround you and there's an eerie silence in the air. How did you get here? You can't remember. There's a path leading north and another to the east.

exits.name: east
exits.description: Take the path to the east

rooms.detail: You look up and notice a small object stuck in the branches of the tree. A small locket. How did it get there?
rooms.name: Tall Oak
rooms.description: You stand before a towering oak tree. It's the tallest one you've seen in this forest. There's a strange sense of comfort being near it. A narrow path leads further north.

actions.name: climb tree
actions.description: {{characterName}} decides to climb the tree and retrieve the locket. It's a small locket with an intricate design. Inside is a picture of a person you don't recognize.

rooms.detail: Upon closer inspection, you notice a set of footprints leading west, towards the stream. They seem fresh.
rooms.name: Forest Stream
rooms.description: You reach a gentle stream running through the forest. The sound of flowing water is soothing. You can't help but wonder who else has been here. A path leads back west.

actions.name: follow footprints
actions.description: {{characterName}} decides to follow the footprints. They lead to a small bundle hidden in the brush. It contains some clothes, a map, and a dagger.

rooms.detail: As you approach the fire pit, you notice a piece of torn cloth. It matches the clothes you found near the stream.
rooms.name: Abandoned Camp
rooms.description: You come across what looks like an abandoned camp. A burnt-out fire pit lies in the center, and discarded utensils are scattered about. Whoever was here, they left in a hurry. To the east, a rocky path leads uphill.

actions.name: investigate camp
actions.description: {{characterName}} decides to investigate the camp. Among the debris, you find a journal. The entries are rushed, hinting at a looming danger and a need to escape.

rooms.detail: You take a deep breath and look around. From here, you can see a village in the distance.
rooms.name: Hilltop
rooms.description: You reach the top of the hill, leaving the forest behind. The journey ahead is unclear, but you know you can't go back. You must press forward and figure out what happened. A path to the north leads towards the distant village.

exits.name: north
exits.description: Follow the path to the village
